message.content:
{"id": "14943", "title": "Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends", "description": "When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF as line feeds on a Windows machine instead of the expected CR/LF. This issue occurs because code assist does not respect platform line ends.", "OB": "1. Open the code editor.
2. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.", "EB": "1. Open the code editor.
2. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.
3. Verify that the resulting code has LF as line feeds on a Windows machine.", "SR": "Modify the code assist functionality to respect platform line ends and ensure that the resulting code uses CR/LF line feeds on a Windows machine."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:

', 'EB': 'They should beCR/LF. ', 'SR': ''}
